rules.expr: clamp_min(quantile without (offset) (0.5, label_replace(avg_over_time(pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m[4h] offset 6d22h) + pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m:avg_over_time_1w - pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m:avg_over_time_1w offset 1w, "offset", "1w", "", "") or label_replace(avg_over_time(pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m[4h] offset 13d22h) + pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m:avg_over_time_1w - pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m:avg_over_time_1w offset 2w, "offset", "2w", "", "") or label_replace(avg_over_time(pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m[4h] offset 20d22h) + pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m:avg_over_time_1w - pf:nginx_http_requests:rate5m:avg_over_time_1w offset 3w, "offset", "3w", "", "")), 0)
